mapper.sql: SALES_ORDER_ID, CREAT_LIST_DATE, INVOICE_NUMBER, CUSTOMER_ID, SALE_AMOUNT, SALE_DELIVERY_STATUS, IS_REBATE, ORDER_STATUS, NOTE_INFORMATION, COMPANY_ID, LAST_MODIFY_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from XS_SALES_OUT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into XS_SALES_OUT (SALES_ORDER_ID, CREAT_LIST_DATE, INVOICE_NUMBER, CUSTOMER_ID, SALE_AMOUNT, SALE_DELIVERY_STATUS, IS_REBATE, ORDER_STATUS, NOTE_INFORMATION, COMPANY_ID, LAST_MODIFY_DATE) values (#{salesOrderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creatListDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saleDeliveryStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isRebate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noteInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into XS_SALES_OUT
SALES_ORDER_ID,
CREAT_LIST_DATE,
INVOICE_NUMBER,
CUSTOMER_ID,
SALE_AMOUNT,
SALE_DELIVERY_STATUS,
IS_REBATE,
ORDER_STATUS,
NOTE_INFORMATION,
COMPANY_ID,
LAST_MODIFY_DATE,

mapper.update:
update XS_SALES_OUT
SALES_ORDER_ID = #{record.salesOrderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREAT_LIST_DATE = #{record.creatListDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INVOICE_NUMBER = #{record.invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_ID = #{record.customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SALE_AMOUNT = #{record.saleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SALE_DELIVERY_STATUS = #{record.saleDeliveryStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_REBATE = #{record.isRebate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_STATUS = #{record.orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE_INFORMATION = #{record.noteInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{record.lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update XS_SALES_OUT set SALES_ORDER_ID = #{record.salesOrderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREAT_LIST_DATE = #{record.creatListDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INVOICE_NUMBER = #{record.invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{record.customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SALE_AMOUNT = #{record.saleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SALE_DELIVERY_STATUS = #{record.saleDeliveryStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_REBATE = #{record.isRebate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_STATUS = #{record.orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE_INFORMATION = #{record.noteInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{record.lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update XS_SALES_OUT
CREAT_LIST_DATE = #{creatListDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INVOICE_NUMBER = #{invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SALE_AMOUNT = #{saleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SALE_DELIVERY_STATUS = #{saleDeliveryStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where SALES_ORDER_ID = #{salesOrderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update XS_SALES_OUT set CREAT_LIST_DATE = #{creatListDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INVOICE_NUMBER = #{invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SALE_AMOUNT = #{saleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SALE_DELIVERY_STATUS = #{saleDeliveryStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_REBATE = #{isRebate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE_INFORMATION = #{noteInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SALES_ORDER_ID = #{salesOrderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
